definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
Human Rights Watch (HRW), New York-based non-governmental organization

sentences.english: Suffice it to say that the following responses of some umbelliferous plants have been observed .
sentences.chinese: 下面仅就已观察到的几种伞形科植物的反应予以说明。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the distribution of the neuropeptides in mouse sublingual gland.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察小鼠舌下腺内神经肽的分布。

sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the effect of laser combined with anal dilatation in the treatment of anal fissure.
sentences.chinese: 目的为观察激光加扩肛术治疗肛裂的疗效。

sentences.english: No one’s ever looked at the brain waves before with human-animal interaction.
sentences.chinese: 以前从没有人就人与动物的互动来观察人类的脑电波。

sentences.english: Objective Observation on arterial distribution of conus arteriosus.
sentences.chinese: 目的动脉圆锥的动脉解剖学观察。

sentences.english: The serum MBP and moisture in brain tissues were observed as index.
sentences.chinese: 以血清MBP和脑组织含水量作为观察指标。

sentences.english: Comparative anatomical observation on leaf of Vernicia Lour and Aleutites Forst.
sentences.chinese: 标题油桐属与石栗属叶的比较解剖观察。

sentences.english: The effect ol' Liu Shen Wan (LSW) on the ultrastructure and function of the zonafasciculata of adrenal cortex was observed in this study.
sentences.chinese: 观察了六神丸对肾上腺皮质束状带形态与功能的作用。

sentences.english: The results showed that there were plenty distributions of the labelled terminals within many pontine nuclei and medullary nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 结果观察到双侧的许多核团均有顺行标记终末出现。

sentences.english: Striking beating patterns in magnetoresistance vs magnetic field are observed in the vicinity of a specific temperature.
sentences.chinese: 在一定温度范围内观察到磁阻拍频现象。

sentences.english: Clear glass cover allows observation of interior mechanism to aid in setting and checkout.
sentences.chinese: 透明玻璃盖允许观察内部机制，以帮助确定和检验。

sentences.english: Sensing food, a roach peers into a two-foot-tall pitcher plant.
sentences.chinese: 发现食物，一只蟑螂仔细观察着两英尺高的猪笼草。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficacy of Blattella germanica control with gel bait and poison powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察套餐法控制酒店德国小蠊的效果。

sentences.english: GIFs serve as a window into US celebrity culture.
sentences.chinese: 动图还成了观察美国名人文化的窗口。

sentences.english: Putin\'s rise continues to perplex even devoted Kremlin observers.
sentences.chinese: 普京的崛起至今让克林姆林宫的观察家们感到迷惑。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of "Cupai Decoction"in the treatment of ovulatory dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察促排卵汤对排卵功能障碍的临床疗效。

definition: to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
to take note of/to pay attention to
to follow sb's tracks/to tail/to shadow/tracking
to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into
